name: Commuter Cowl - Fuchsia and Grey
description:
Colour: Fuchsia and Grey

*** 16/12/13 Due to the Huge popularity of the Fuchsia Cowl this product is now sold out, new stock will be available in the New Year. In the mean time you can order from online retailer Cycle Chic ***

The Commuter Cowl is a versatile product that harbors practical and stylish elements essential for the discerning cyclist.

Made from high-quality wool ensuring the scarves are beautiful, warm and hard wearing. The fleece lining gives soft, comfortable, and quick drying elements.

The scarf features a very subtle reflective piping which is effective when bright light is shone.

Modern Fair Isle pattern contains: little bikes, tiny chevrons and the occasional love heart.

Made in the heart of Scotland.

Measuring approx. 60cm in circumference (7 bikes long, 3 bike lengths wide). 
This is a looped scarf - Perfect for bicycle commuters. The cowl is designed so that it can be pulled over the face when riding or tucked under the chin for warmth.

New for winter 2013: Commuter Cowls are fleece lined to wick sweat and have been made with 50/50 merino/teflon treated wool, this means this product is more resistant to stains and will not pill when washed multiple times.

Wash on a normal cycle, can be spun dry.

name: Bike Wheel Cushion - Blue and Orange
description:
Bike Wheel Cushion

Colour: Blue and Orange

This beautifully hand printed wheel cushion is the perfect accompaniment to the bike buffs home. A subtle reminder on your sofa that somewhere there is a bike to be ridden. 

The cushion features a hand printed wheel design onto cotton, with a coloured reverse, and contrasting piping.

Measuring 45 cm the cover encases a plump round hollowfibre cushion pad and fastens on the reverse with a concealed zip.

Wash by hand, allow to dry naturally.

name: Bike Twist Snood - Cream and Rose
description:
Bike Twist Snood 

Colour: Cream and Rose

The knitted Snoods make for a charming addition to your winter wardrobe. Thick Merino wool keeps you out the cold whilst the overall scarves look great worn over a jersey or tucked around the collar of a coat. The looped snood is practical, yet stylish – no lose ends to fly away in the wind or get caught in the spokes!

Made in Scotland

Modern Fair Isle pattern contains: little bikes, tiny chevrons and the occasional love heart.

Made from 100% Merino wool ensuring the scarves are beautiful, warm and hard wearing.

Measuring approx. 85cm in circumference (8 bikes long, 3 bike lengths wide).
This is a looped scarf with a twist in the middle - which sits comfortably around the neck while the thick merino wool keeps out the cold.

Wash at 30’, can be spun dry, but for longevity allow to dry naturally.

Matching hat now available.

name: The Snug Spectator Pink Merino Bike Hat
description:
The Snug Spectator Merino Bike Hat

Following on from the huge success of the Bike Twist Snoods – Now we have The Snug Spectator Hat to match.

The essential addition to the bike buffs winter wardrobe. Ideal to wear when warming up on rollers, when out watching a cold hill climb, or better still show your enthusiasm for two wheels when off the bike too. 

Double thickness 100% merino hat, perfect for keeping warm on chilly days.

Pattern contains little bikes and chevrons – and a big merino pom on the top!

Made in Scotland

Turn inside out and Wash at 30’. Do not Tumble dry.

name: Bike Twist Snood - French Navy and White
description:
Bike Twist Snood

Colour: French Navy and White 

This scarf made in the heart of Scotland

Modern Fair Isle pattern contains: little bikes, tiny chevrons and the occasional love heart.

Made from high-quality merino wool ensuring the scarves are beautiful, warm and hard wearing.

Measuring approx 85cm in circumference (8 bikes long, 3 bike lengths wide).

This is a looped scarf with a twist in the middle - which sits comfortably around the neck while the thick merino wool keeps out the cold.

Looks great worn with a jumper or tucked around the collar of coat.

Also wonderful for bicycle commuters - no lose ends to fly away in the wind or get caught in the spokes.

Scarf is packaged in a wee gift box.

name: Mountain Range Scarf - Aran White
description:
Mountain Range Scarf

Colour: Aran White & Grey

This scarf is lovingly handmade from ball of wool to cosy snood. 

The pattern contains a snow topped mountain range. The lines are subtle and tasteful so the mountains become almost abstract.

Made from high-quality merino wool ensures the scarves are beautiful, warm, and hardwearing.

Measuring approx 70cm in circumference and 25cm wide. The circular formation means the material is doubled over giving the scarf twice the thickness. 

This is a looped scarf and can be worn folded over to give it shape or pulled up around the neck for warmth. 

It looks great when worn with a jumper or tucked around the collar of a coat. 

The scarf comes packaged in a gift box.
